message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $15,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could come down to $13,500. This feels like a reasonable compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
